content.question: In the context of the passage as a whole, the fourteenth and fifteenth paragraphs do which of the following?

choices.label: Amplify the significance of a comparison by making, then qualifying, an absolute claim
Enhance the author’s credibility by reiterating her own ideas in the voice of an outside observer
Encourage readers to relate to the author’s experiences by helping them visualize her facial expressions
Preempt a likely objection by demonstrating the author’s lack of resentment for those who are more athletic than she is

content.answer: Amplify the significance of a comparison by making, then qualifying, an absolute claim

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
